episode30.name: 30   Hog Hoops, JJ Meadors, and Signing Day
episode30.description: We break down the week in hog hoops, interview hog legend JJ Meadors, and talk about the hogs 2015 recruiting class.
episode30.keywords: JJ Meadors, basketball, football, signing day, Meadors, The Hog Cast, Arkansas, Razorbacks, WPS, Miss State,
